attributes.action: I propose that under 18's should be allowed to remain unless they attempt to purchase illegal substances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Me and many others are sick of being penalized for mature and respectful behaviour in public inns, restaurants and pubs. We are often asked to leave when we have shown respect to the law by not attempting to purchase alcoholic beverages and behaving in a less rowdy manner then the drunk adults.

We have a right to be there as young adults in a social environment whether for socialising or business. So
I propose that under 18's should be allowed to remain unless they attempt to purchase illegal substances.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
